alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 06 at 1:43PM MST until March 07 at 11:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 25 mph. * WHERE...The Rapid City area, the Central Black Hills, the Southern Black Hills and the Hermosa Foot Hills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Central Black Hills; Hermosa Foot Hills; Rapid City; Southern Black Hills
